full_summary:
**8.5-8.8M Aluminum Rigid Hull Inflatable Boat (RHIB) with Trailer Tender**

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Trade Agreement:** CETA, WTO-AGP, CPTPP, CFTA, FTAs with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and UK
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering

**Tender Background:**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) requires the fabrication and supply of one 8.5-8.8 metre, aluminum rigid hull inflatable boat with enclosed cabin and trailer, to be delivered to Nanaimo, British Columbia by March 31, 2024. This requirement falls under the PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60MC-190001, Stream 3 - RHIB - Greater than 6 Meters - Aluminum - Non-SOLAS - Welding Certification Required.

**Bidder Eligibility:**

To bid on this solicitation, the bidder must be a supplier with a permanent list or meet the qualification requirements. New suppliers must first qualify for the supply arrangement.

**Tender Details:**

* Tender Number: FP197-240002/A
* Tender Closing Date: June 14, 2023, 17:00:00
* Delivery Date: March 31, 2024
* Region of Delivery: British Columbia
* Trade Agreements: CETA, WTO-AGP, CPTPP, CFTA, FTAs with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and UK

**Contract Information:**

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**

* Elsie Mountford, Contract Officer
* Email: elsie-may.mountford@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: (236) 464-3238

Note: I removed all the unnecessary/ irrelevant information and rephrased the rest of the text in a more readable and professional format. 

Also, please let me know if you need any further changes or if there is anything else I can help you with! 
Let me know if this is okay! 

Awaiting your feedback. 

Best,
Your Technical Writer. 
=====================================
